p: A central pathology review was carried out as previously reported. 16 Antigens routinely examined by immunohistochemistry included CD3, CD5, CD10, CD20, cyclin D1, SOX‐11, Ki‐67, and cyclin D1. Four hematopathologists reviewed the pathology specimens and classified them according to the WHO classification system 2001. 15 The diagnosis by the central pathology review committee was used in this article.
